articles.title: KGF 2 Collects RRR's Amount in 8 Days.. - Greatandhra
articles.description: The dream run for KGF Chapter 2 in Hindi is continuing. On its 8th day, the film collected Rs 13 crore in the Hindi belt, taking its total to Rs 264 crore.
articles.content:
